title: FloodTags Dashboard
description: An online dashboard to monitor online media for flood information. The Dashboard shows what people are saying about floods in the media. This enables online monitoring new developments related to floods.

title: Relevancer
description: Relevancer aims at finding a balance between complexity of a tweet data set and expert needs from this data. The process can be summarized as creating a need based classifier without sacrificing precision, information, and time.

title: Lama Events
description: Lama Events is a calendar application listing events in the near future. The events are detected and selected by a fully automatic procedure in the Dutch Twitter stream.
